amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings recognizing that addressing climate change and providing affordable energy to consumers are not mutually exclusive.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (CA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Levin (CA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (CA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
